Apps that use speech recognition must add the following key, with appropriate descriptions, in their info.plist file:

example.code: <key>NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription</key> <string>Speech recognition will be used to determine which words you speak into this device's microphone.</string>

remarks.para: If an application does not have this key, the operating system will execute a "silent" shutdown at runtime, with no exception or ability to log the mistake.
Additionally, if the app uses the T:AVFoundation.AVEngine to access the microphone, the app must also contain a <key>NSMicrophoneUsageDescription</key> key.
